text: En mɨgɨrɨgɨam kamakɨn: God, Kraisɨn ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn, a nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba bar me gamima, me Godɨn apanim gamir arazim ataghragha, egha an namakabar mɨn otifi. Egha men arazir kurar me amiziba, a ua dagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Egha a ingangarir kam e ganɨga ghaze, ia akam nan apanibav kɨnightɨ, me oregh egh nan namakabar otivigham.
